titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize former members of the armed forces who are totally disabled as the result of a service-connected disability to travel on military aircraft in the same manner and to the same extent as retired members of the Armed Forces are entitled to travel on such aircraft.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Committee on Armed Services requested executive comment from Department of Defense.
Referred to Subcommittee on Manpower and Personnel (Arm Serv).

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Provides for free travel on military aircraft for any former member of the armed forces who has a service-connected disability rated total by the Veterans Administration.
